document.docAuthor: Sachanowicz, Konrad, Ciechanowski, Mateusz, Rachwald, Alek & Piskorski, Michał
document.masterDocTitle: Overview of bat species reported in Albania with the first country records for eight species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Overview of bat species reported in Albania with the first country records for eight species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Museum and Institute of Zoology, Polish Academy of Sciences, Warsaw, Poland;
Department of Vertebrate Ecology and Zoology, University of Gdańsk, Gdańsk, Poland;
Department of Forest Ecology, Forest Research Institute, Raszyn, Poland;
Department of Comparative Anatomy and Anthropology, Maria Curie Skłodowska University, Lublin, Poland

subSubSection.paragraph: Pishkash II (location same as above), 28 September 2005 , 1♂ ad. netted at the entrance of a small cave in a limestone gorge. The morphological identification of this species was confirmed by genetic analysis (A. Kiefer, pers. comm.).

caption.paragraph: Table 1. Checklist of the bat species reported for Albania with chronology of the first records.

tr.td: First records for the country: locality and (a year), [data sources] upper index numbers refer to literature

subSubSection.paragraph:
( Continued ) No previous record of
Pl . austriacus ( Lamani 1970 )
has been sufficiently documented to confirm the identification of this species (Sachanowicz and Ciechanowski 2006) and exclude a similar, newly recognized species,
Pl . macrobullaris
( Spitzenberger et al. 2006 ; Dietz et al. 2009 ).
